data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Leeds at Anfield.
In the minute 1, Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Leeds's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 3, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Liverpool.
Liverpool push forward at Anfield and Mohamed Salah gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leeds defence.
Goal! Mohamed Salah gives Liverpool a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 5, Leeds to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Liverpool's half?
Throw-in Liverpool.
In the minute 8, Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leeds are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal! Jack Harrison levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 12, That's a fine assist from Kalvin Phillips.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards Leeds a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Liverpool's Andrew Robertson is whistled for offside at Anfield.
Goal kick for Leeds at Anfield.
Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Liverpool.
In the minute 20, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Virgil van Dijk heads in to make it 2-1 at Anfield.
Andrew Robertson with an assist there.
In the minute 22, Liverpool needs to be cautious. Leeds have an attacking throw-in.
Leeds's Jack Harrison has run offside.
Michael Oliver signals a Liverpool throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Liverpool Liverpool drive forward through Jordan Henderson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Jack Harrison for the away team is judged to be offside.
Andrew Robertson (Liverpool) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 29, Naby Keita (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Patrick Bamford is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
In the minute 32, In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mohamed Salah puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 34, Leeds have a goal kick.
Throw-in Leeds.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Leeds.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 38, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Sadio Mane of Liverpool is pulled up for offside.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leeds defender.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Throw-in for Leeds at Anfield.
Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
In the minute 43, Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
At Anfield the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The first-half has come to a close in Liverpool.
The second-half is underway at Anfield.
In the minute 46, In Liverpool Leeds's Patrick Bamford is caught offside.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 48, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Georginio Wijnaldum for Liverpool drives towards goal at Anfield. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Michael Oliver signals a Leeds throw-in in Liverpool's half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Leeds.
Leeds drive upfield and Patrick Bamford gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Liverpool defender.
In Liverpool, Helder Costa of Leeds is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 51, Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
In the minute 52, Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leeds's half?
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Important block from the Leeds defence as Mohamed Salah fires in a strike for Liverpool.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Liverpool surge into the attack at Anfield but Virgil van Dijk’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Leeds at Anfield.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Liverpool.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
Leeds drive forward but Jack Harrison is judged offside.
Throw-in for Leeds at Anfield.
In the minute 59, Jurgen Klopp is making the team's first substitution at Anfield with Fabinho replacing Naby Keita.
Important block from the Leeds defence as Mohamed Salah fires in a strike for Liverpool.
In the minute 62, Liverpool's Sadio Mane gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Michael Oliver awards Leeds a goal kick.
The away team replace Pablo Hernandez with Rodrigo Moreno.
Liverpool push forward at Anfield and Mohamed Salah gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leeds defence.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 63, Tyler Roberts is replacing Patrick Bamford for the away team.
In the minute 64, Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Liverpool make their second substitution with Curtis Jones replacing Jordan Henderson.
In the minute 66, Goal! Mateusz Klich equalizes to bring the score to 3-3.
Great play from Helder Costa to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Leeds's area.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a Liverpool throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 69, Leeds needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Luke Ayling for Leeds who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Luke Ayling for Leeds is back on the field again.
In the minute 71, In Liverpool, Sadio Mane of Liverpool is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Mohamed Salah for Liverpool gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Leeds have a goal kick.

Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Free kick Liverpool.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Liverpool.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leeds.
Liverpool's Roberto Firmino has been booked in Liverpool.
In the minute 77, In Liverpool Leeds attack through Kalvin Phillips. The finish is off target, however.

Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.

Corner awarded to Liverpool.

Jamie Shackleton is on a sub for Mateusz Klich for Leeds.
Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold breaks free at Anfield. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 82, Leeds have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Leeds at Anfield.

Liverpool drive upfield and Roberto Firmino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.

Liverpool's Roberto Firmino gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 87, Liverpool have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Liverpool take a 4-3 lead thanks to a Mohamed Salah spot-kick..
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Liverpool make their third substitution with Joel Matip replacing Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Leeds's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Free kick Leeds.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-3.
